General.Name: Kumho Electric
General.Description: Kumho Electric, Inc. manufactures and sells lighting solutions in South Korea. The company offers general lighting products, such as fluorescent, electrodeless, incandescent, halogen, and CDM/HQI lamps; electronic ballasts; and electronic insect control systems. It also provides various LED lighting products; and back light units. The company was formerly known as Chungyup Manufacturing Co. and changed its name to Kumho Electric, Inc. in 1978. Kumho Electric, Inc. was founded in 1935 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
